backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Cursor Agent Mode - Advanced reasoning and instruction following
original_prompt: Prepare a brief for my upcoming meeting with customer Beta and include a dossier for each customer attendee and the topics they are most interested in. Include a background on their company.

gutts.name: Meeting Details Retrieval
gutts.user_goal: Know who's attending and meeting context
gutts.evidence: Retrieved meeting: 'Customer Beta Quarterly Review' Nov 14, 2025 with 4 attendees from Beta Corp

gutts.name: Company Background Research
gutts.capability: Gather information about customer Beta company
gutts.evidence: Compiled Beta Corp profile: SaaS company, 500 employees, $50M revenue, key products, market position, recent news

gutts.name: Attendee Identity Resolution
gutts.capability: Identify each customer attendee and their roles
gutts.evidence: Identified attendees: Sarah Chen (VP Product), Michael Rodriguez (Director Engineering), Lisa Park (PM), James Kim (Solutions Architect)

gutts.name: Individual Dossier Creation
gutts.capability: For each attendee, compile background, role, history
gutts.evidence: Created dossiers: Sarah (technical background, cares about scalability), Michael (previous interactions, integration concerns), Lisa (new to role, learning phase), James (power user, feature requests)

gutts.name: Topic Interest Analysis
gutts.capability: Identify topics each attendee cares about based on history
gutts.user_goal: Discuss what matters to each person
gutts.evidence: Sarah: API performance, security. Michael: Integration architecture, documentation. Lisa: User experience, training. James: Advanced features, customization

gutts.name: Relationship History Compilation
gutts.capability: Summarize past interactions, deals, issues with customer
gutts.user_goal: Aware of relationship history and context
gutts.evidence: Relationship summary: Customer since 2023, $200K annual contract, 3 support tickets (all resolved), 95% satisfaction score, expansion opportunity identified

gutts.name: Relevant Content Gathering
gutts.evidence: Gathered materials: Q3 usage report, API documentation updates, case study draft, pricing proposal for expansion

gutts.name: Brief Document Assembly
gutts.capability: Compile all information into structured prep brief
gutts.user_goal: Complete brief ready for meeting prep
gutts.evidence: Generated comprehensive brief: company overview, 4 attendee dossiers with interests, relationship timeline, discussion topics, supporting materials

notes: Generated by GPT-5 - Matches reference decomposition of 8 GUTTs
